creator: SnoreCare KMS
descriptionHtml:
All functionalities at a glance:


• Scientifically developed snoring detection algorithm

• App records in standby mode, therefore little power consumption

• The recorded data is only saved locally on the mobile phone

• The audio snoring signal can be monitored at any time of sleep.

• Marks snoring events using bar charts with snoring intensity

• Real-time display and acoustic output of detected snoring events on free
selectable sleep times via cursor control
 
• Optional vibration when a snoring event is detected

• Manually adjustable start delay of the recording for the sleep process

• Snore analysis of the daily recording up to a month

• Analysis of the average daily snoring frequency over 24 hours of all recordings

• Choice between internal and external SD memory

• Manual stopping at any time and also automatic stopping of the
Record after 9 hours of sleep so you don't waste battery energy
 
• Detailed display in the bar chart with time stamp, frequency and
Sound pressure level and line diagram for the general background noise

• Detailed display in a list with time stamp, frequency and sound pressure level

• Copy function for the list


With SnoreApp you will get an overview about how often and how intensive you are snoring. SnoreApp selects uniquely only snoring for recording.

Using a scientifically-developed detection algorithm, snoring sounds are clearly distinguished from other ambient sounds, resulting in as accurate a snoring detection result as possible.

The recognition algorithm was created on the basis of scientific findings and tests of snoring audio signals based on various parameters such as fundamental frequency, snoring periodicity, voicing, volume (sound pressure level) and various other snoring signal features.

Through continuous testing with snoring from the sleep laboratory of a renowned German ENT clinic, this algorithm is constantly being verified and further improved. The Snore algorithm was developed in collaboration with the Faculty of Information Technology of the University of Applied Sciences Mannheim and since then has been constantly redeveloped and improved in recent years.

Snoring not only affects the sleep of you and your partner, it can also be related to health problems, such as those associated with respiratory distress (sleep apnea).

SnoreApp shows you the snoring behavior as well as the volume and the exact time of occurrence. Operation is intuitive and simple, so you can start measuring immediately.

Of course, SnoreApp is ad-free and with no hidden costs.

Also, test the effectiveness of snoring prevention methods used and review how your snoring behavior develops over many nights.
descriptionShort: snore recognition, snore recording and snore analysis

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New section "Settings"
- New theme (Dark mode) is available
- Get a notification when snoring is detected that can be automatically shown on a connected smartwatch

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- SnoreApp Lite and Pro have been combined to SnoreApp. You can purchase premium features from inside the app via In-App-Billing.
- Improved design to fit your preferences.
- Several bug fixes.

The Snore algorithm was developed in collaboration with the Faculty of Information Technology of the University of Applied Sciences Mannheim and since then has been constantly redeveloped and improved in recent years.

Snoring not only affects the sleep of you and your partner, it can also be related to health problems, such as those associated with respiratory distress (sleep apnea).

SnoreApp shows you the snoring behavior as well as the volume and the exact time of occurrence. Operation is intuitive and simple, so you can start measuring immediately.

Of course, SnoreApp is ad-free and with no hidden costs.

Also, test the effectiveness of snoring prevention methods used and review how your snoring behavior develops over many nights.

Icons generated by Flaticon
descriptionShort: snore recognition, snore recording and snore analysis

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Important bug fixes and performance improvements
- Recordings can now be adapted even better to your wishes

title: SnoreApp: snoring & snore analysis & detection

creator: SnoreCare KMS
descriptionHtml:
All functionalities at a glance:

• Scientifically developed snoring detection algorithm

• App records in standby mode, therefore little power consumption

• The recorded data is only saved locally on the mobile phone

• The audio snoring signal can be monitored at any time of sleep.

• Marks snoring events using bar charts with snoring intensity

• Real-time display and acoustic output of detected snoring events on free selectable sleep times via cursor control
 
• Optional vibration when a snoring event is detected

• Manually adjustable start delay of the recording for the sleep process

• Snore analysis of the daily recording up to a month

• Analysis of the average daily snoring frequency over 24 hours of all recordings

• Choice between internal and external SD memory

• Manual stopping at any time and also automatic stopping of the
recording so you don't waste battery energy
 
• Detailed display in the bar chart with time stamp, frequency and
sound pressure level and line diagram for the general background noise

• Detailed display in a list with time stamp, frequency and sound pressure level

• Copy function for the list


With SnoreApp you will get an overview about how often and how intensive you are snoring. SnoreApp selects uniquely only snoring for recording.

Using a scientifically-developed detection algorithm, snoring sounds are clearly distinguished from other ambient sounds, resulting in as accurate a snoring detection result as possible.

The recognition algorithm was created on the basis of scientific findings and tests of snoring audio signals based on various parameters such as fundamental frequency, snoring periodicity, voicing, volume (sound pressure level) and various other snoring signal features.

Through continuous testing with snoring from the sleep laboratory of a renowned German ENT clinic, this algorithm is constantly being verified and further improved. The Snore algorithm was developed in collaboration with the Faculty of Information Technology of the University of Applied Sciences Mannheim and since then has been constantly redeveloped and improved in recent years.

Snoring not only affects the sleep of you and your partner, it can also be related to health problems, such as those associated with respiratory distress (sleep apnea).

SnoreApp shows you the snoring behavior as well as the volume and the exact time of occurrence. Operation is intuitive and simple, so you can start measuring immediately.

Of course, SnoreApp is ad-free and with no hidden costs.

Also, test the effectiveness of snoring prevention methods used and review how your snoring behavior develops over many nights.
